title: Jackbox Party Pack 11’s Hear Say Lets Players Steal the Audio Spotlight
description: Jackbox Games unleashes voice-powered chaos this fall! The Jackbox Party Pack 11 arrives in fall 2025, featuring Hear…
author: Peter Holden
excerpt: Jackbox Games unleashes voice-powered chaos this fall! The Jackbox Party Pack 11 arrives in fall 2025, featuring Hear Say, a revolutionary party game that
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. Jackbox Games unleashes voice-powered chaos this fall! The Jackbox Party Pack 11 arrives in fall 2025, featuring Hear Say, a revolutionary party game that transforms players into instant audio stars. Using smartphones as microphones, friends record bizarre sound effects and hilarious one-liners, creating the most outrageous collaborative video content Jackbox has ever produced. Revolutionary Voice Technology Transforms Party Gaming Hear Say breaks every party game rule. Players become the entertainment! Using advanced microphone technology, the game captures crystal-clear audio from any smartphone, automatically balancing and filtering recordings for studio-quality results. Even whispered jokes sound perfect. The system seamlessly layers individual voice contributions into surreal video mashups that showcase every player's unique comedic timing and creativity. Jackbox Games Simple Gameplay Creates Endless Laughter Every round delivers fresh hilarity through quirky audio prompts. Players record sound effects or dialogue for mysterious video clips. These recordings merge into bizarre collaborative scenes. Then comes the voting! Everyone selects the funniest or most convincing performance, maintaining competitive energy while celebrating creativity. No improv experience required, just willingness to sound absolutely ridiculous. Jackbox Games Shy players shine alongside natural performers in this improv playground. The Foley artist-style mini-games and wacky stock footage combinations instantly break ice between strangers and energize longtime friend groups. Hear Say succeeds by giving everyone spotlight moments. Quiet voices get amplified. Bold personalities get showcased. Every gathering becomes a comedy club where participation equals stardom. Jackbox Games Creative Director Alina Constantin designed Hear Say as pure self-expression celebration. Over one hundred unique scenes spark uninhibited, giddy play across diverse personality types. The development team crafted prompts specifically to unleash creative sides players never knew existed, ensuring fresh experiences even for party pack veterans. Every voice matters. Every contribution counts. Cross-Platform Availability and Pricing Details The Jackbox Party Pack 11 launches fall 2025 for £24.99 across every major gaming platform. Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, Epic, Apple TV, iPad, Mac, and Amazon Fire TV all support the new pack. Amazon Luna subscribers gain automatic access through their existing Jackbox Games subscription, ensuring voice-powered fun reaches players regardless of their preferred gaming setup. Hear Say represents bold evolution in collaborative entertainment, combining cutting-edge audio technology with pure creative chaos. Its universal appeal, comprehensive platform support, and unlimited replay value position this voice-centric experience as the centerpiece of every future Jackbox session, promising to transform ordinary gatherings into unforgettable audio adventures when The Jackbox Party Pack 11 launches this fall. With over a decade's experience covering the world of Android and having reviewed more devices than he can count, Peter is excited about where the world of tech is heading. He is currently packing the Oppo Find X8 Pro, OnePlus Pad 2, and an ASUS Chromebook Plus. Previous Post
html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

Jackbox Games unleashes voice-powered chaos this fall! The Jackbox Party Pack 11 arrives in fall 2025, featuring Hear Say, a revolutionary party game that transforms players into instant audio stars. Using smartphones as microphones, friends record bizarre sound effects and hilarious one-liners, creating the most outrageous collaborative video content Jackbox has ever produced.

Revolutionary Voice Technology Transforms Party Gaming

Hear Say breaks every party game rule. Players become the entertainment! Using advanced microphone technology, the game captures crystal-clear audio from any smartphone, automatically balancing and filtering recordings for studio-quality results. Even whispered jokes sound perfect. The system seamlessly layers individual voice contributions into surreal video mashups that showcase every player's unique comedic timing and creativity.

Simple Gameplay Creates Endless Laughter

Every round delivers fresh hilarity through quirky audio prompts. Players record sound effects or dialogue for mysterious video clips. These recordings merge into bizarre collaborative scenes. Then comes the voting! Everyone selects the funniest or most convincing performance, maintaining competitive energy while celebrating creativity. No improv experience required, just willingness to sound absolutely ridiculous.

Shy players shine alongside natural performers in this improv playground. The Foley artist-style mini-games and wacky stock footage combinations instantly break ice between strangers and energize longtime friend groups. Hear Say succeeds by giving everyone spotlight moments. Quiet voices get amplified. Bold personalities get showcased. Every gathering becomes a comedy club where participation equals stardom.

Creative Director Alina Constantin designed Hear Say as pure self-expression celebration. Over one hundred unique scenes spark uninhibited, giddy play across diverse personality types. The development team crafted prompts specifically to unleash creative sides players never knew existed, ensuring fresh experiences even for party pack veterans. Every voice matters. Every contribution counts.

Cross-Platform Availability and Pricing Details

The Jackbox Party Pack 11 launches fall 2025 for £24.99 across every major gaming platform. Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, Epic, Apple TV, iPad, Mac, and Amazon Fire TV all support the new pack. Amazon Luna subscribers gain automatic access through their existing Jackbox Games subscription, ensuring voice-powered fun reaches players regardless of their preferred gaming setup.

Hear Say represents bold evolution in collaborative entertainment, combining cutting-edge audio technology with pure creative chaos. Its universal appeal, comprehensive platform support, and unlimited replay value position this voice-centric experience as the centerpiece of every future Jackbox session, promising to transform ordinary gatherings into unforgettable audio adventures when The Jackbox Party Pack 11 launches this fall.

With over a decade's experience covering the world of Android and having reviewed more devices than he can count, Peter is excited about where the world of tech is heading. He is currently packing the Oppo Find X8 Pro, OnePlus Pad 2, and an ASUS Chromebook Plus.
